website_summaries.verdict: The Logitech UE Mobile Boombox sports an improved design and slightly better sound than last year's Mini Boombox -- for the same price.
pros: The Logitech UE Mobile Boombox is a very compact Bluetooth speaker that has a built-in rechargeable battery, speakerphone capabilities, a line input, and ruggedized design
It sounds good for its tiny size
cons: The Mobile Boombox just can't produce a ton of bass

customer_reviews.title: Buy the refurbished one for great sound!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on my young niece's recommendation. She told me it would be perfect for amplifying my Pandora music while working in the kitchen, in the garden, in my yoga space. I could not be happier. So compact, yet clear, strong sound. I love it that it works equally well plugged into an electrical outlet or with its (internal) battery charged. I bought the refurbished one. Works great! Worth the the price savings.
customer_reviews.author: mainebohemian

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic small speaker
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if you can purchase these anymore but if they do come back on Amazon I highly recommend it. I bought this guy for $60 back in 2014 and it's still going strong. Sound quality is fantastic for its size and the bluetooth connection works every time without fail. it's obviously compact so it's great for travel which is when it gets most of its use.
customer_reviews.author: Nick R

customer_reviews.title: ACTUALLY WORKS as a bluetooth speakerphone!  Also sounds great!
customer_reviews.text: Finally a speaker that sounds great and actually WORKS as a speakerphone. I've gone threw so many of these products purchasing items from $19.99 thru $65 dollars. Had to throw each and every one away. Either the sound quality was terrible, speakerphone never worked, or Bluetooth kept dropping connection. This product works!!!!!! Yeah, it's more expensive, but I would gladly pay it over and over again for an actual Bluetooth speakerphone that does what it advertises to do.
customer_reviews.author: Zio

customer_reviews.title: Some issues with bluetooth connection to my pc
customer_reviews.text: The sound is fine. A little small but really just fine. I have my speaker connected to a pc via bluetooth and the problem I'm having is that when watching something online, if I open a new window, the sound shuts down for 30-60 seconds...then starts back up. I don't know if this is a function of the bluetooth connectivity or my pc which is newish and runs the latest OS or the speaker. Very annoying since I am use to multi tasking. If anyone knows, feel free to comment on my review. I may have to resort to wired speakers and use this mini in another room with my iphone.
customer_reviews.author: Angelroost

customer_reviews.title: Sound ok,wish they were just a bit louder though,and then there's more.
customer_reviews.text: Speakers sound pretty dang good for such a small footprint,but that's nothing new to the stereo/computer world,so the main feature I suppose is the bluetooth wireless feature. Well,about that,the given UE app for this product is pretty much useless IME,bought two of them and could'nt get mine to work in stereo @ all,and my Nexus7 tablet would'nt do anything with the UE app for this product,so I just opted to use wires instead,thus defeating the whole point of having BT speakers. Probably stick to using my headphones for most of my listening needs.
customer_reviews.author: Bret P.

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for several months at small bluetooth speakers to play music from my iPhone and iPad. This was recommended in April 2013 by The Wirecutter website so i decided to bite the bullet. My first impressions were: Wow, that is small! Did I order the wrong thing, and my second impression was Wow, that is loud, and sounds great! My intended uses are for listening to music while I'm cooking and doing work outside. Meanwhile, my 14-year old daughter has already tried to steal it. It may not be an audiophile purchase, but if you're listening to music from your iPhone stuff, can you really call yourself an audiophile? :) Two dancing thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Bradford Parks

customer_reviews.title: ... this for about two weeks but think it is great. Easy to use and loud enough that it ...
customer_reviews.text: I have only been using this for about two weeks but think it is great. Easy to use and loud enough that it fills my whole 1,200ft apartment without sounding faint. I do wish this had a auto off feature be cause we have a habit of leaving the house with it still being on. Speaker phone is very useful, voice pick up is clear. one thing to watch out for is turning it on when the main paired phone is being used in telephone conversation. the conversation will automatically transfer to the box if it is the last Bluetooth device it paired with.
customer_reviews.author: Menion99

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little unit
customer_reviews.text: Best bang for the buck bluetooth speaker I've owned. Sound quality is exceptional for it's size and the battery lasts forever. Easy to transport and standard plug make this a truely versitile unit.
customer_reviews.author: Chris James

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to the Jawbone Jambox.
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker. I use them all the time. My sister has a Jawbone Jambox that I have used on multiple occasions and I can say that this logitech speaker is better, despite being almost half the price. This speaker is louder and is simpler to use. The only thing that is better about the Jawbone Jambox is that the battery life is longer, but only by a few hours. I can use my logitech speaker for four or five hours and then leave it on without any music playing for another four or five before it starts chirping (its signal that it's about to die).
customer_reviews.author: E Boda

customer_reviews.title: Honestly love this little thing.
customer_reviews.text: Sounds awesome for its size and im a serious audiophile. Could be slightly louder but Id sacrifice a few decibels for better sound quality. That being said it's still loud enough for me to hear well at work, in a very busy grocery store with carts, people, and coolers running. A coworker has the same one and we linked ours together and they play stereo as independant left and right speakers too. Bluetooth reaches at least 50 feet in my experience. Very happy. Also it sounds better than Logitechs more expensive UE tube speaker my friend got.
customer_reviews.author: Scott D

customer_reviews.title: Great for living room parties
customer_reviews.text: I had my qualms about buying this boombox as opposed to the newer UE one, especially since the newer one seems to have some updated specs, but I went with this one to save a few bucks, and boy, I was not disappointed! This has a great sound range and doesn't shake as much as I expected even at max volume with heavy bass. Additionally, the volume is more than enough for a small party in your living room. However, if you want a speaker that can reach more than a large living room over some overhead noise, then you'll probably want to get the big boom. Overall, great product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Poe

customer_reviews.title: Amazing lil' guy. I bring mini boombox EVERYWHERE
customer_reviews.text: I tuck this lil' boombox in my bag and I have never regretted being ready for a dance party. It's really easy for folks to connect to this device so they can play what they like - people love being dj. The sound is really impressive for its small size, but I think I might upgrade to a bluetooth boombox with a hint more bass. It's amazing for trips, for parties, for impromptu activities anywhere! It's got a great, rugged shape and the charge lasts great - it can be charge with anyone's micro USB cord, too! I got the cheapest color.
customer_reviews.author: Fairy

customer_reviews.title: Wasteful packaging
customer_reviews.text: The amount of useless packaging with this great speaker is astonishing ! Preposterous might be a better word. Seriously, it comes in a huge clear plexiglass box.......... divided with thick, stiff plastic walls. For what ? Just try to take this show-box apart ! The price would drop $15 easily if the packaging were less like a museum-piece on a pedestal. The speaker is great, btw, and love it's connectivity features. A tiny bit too much bass, but with a device equalizer you can drop that down. Trust me, the packaging will blow your mind !
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Ken

customer_reviews.title: Wow--awesome, especially for its size
customer_reviews.text: I use this two ways: First--I connect it (bluetooth) to my iPad when I am driving and using iPad GPS software so that I can hear the driving directions more clearly in my motorhome. Second, I use it for listening to music outside at the picnic table while camping. This thing is awesome.. the size will surprise you, but the sound will even more. It's an excellent sounding speaker for the size, it gets sufficiently loud for my uses, and the case has a rubberized feel to it so it will sit nicely just about anywhere (even a bumpy motorhome dash) without sliding off easily. Love this little product and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a gift after owning one for several months. It works quite well and for its size it sounds good. It makes a nice addition to a smart phone or tablet. A speaker with drivers this small can't be expected to put out a lot of sound but it did exceed my expectations overall. Music comes through nice and clear, the sound quality is clean. The volume level seems to be noticeably louder when streaming heart radio or Pandora compared to music already on my phone or tablet...which is fine by the way. The portability is great and seems to be pretty durable...so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Rob D

customer_reviews.title: Great, Little Speaker
customer_reviews.text: Very small, portable, and easy to use. Just turn on any Bluetooth device, connect, and it's ready to go. It has good range too. I can connect it to my phone or tablet, and carry the speaker anywhere around my home: upstairs, downstairs, deck, or garage, my tunes are with me. The sound quality, I would say, is very good. It's not quite the "clean" or "crisp" sound you get from real high quality speakers, and I don't think it sounds quite as good when played at max volumes, but it's a great value and perfect for the casual listener who just wants to listen to music when they want, where they want.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Your search for a mobile boombox ends here!!
customer_reviews.text: An amazing device! Impressed by the reviews, I ordered this mobile boombox. I am so impressed with it's function and sound. The backside is the base speaker, impressive base for such a small device. The front are the normal speakers. This boombox is much smaller than I expected, but nonetheless a relatively powerful speaker. I even use it in our backyard!! In the garage while working! I particularly like the rechargeable long-lasting battery which powers it for hours! I think I will buy another one just so I can have two speakers working together. A good investment!
customer_reviews.author: --SJ

customer_reviews.title: Can't Double up this model
customer_reviews.text: It works fine and sounds good compared to others this size. This model cannot be paired up or doubled up with another to play in stereo. I also bought a U E mini Boom. There is one BIG difference between these models. With the mini boom the sound quality is the same, but there is an app for U E Mini Boom to pair them in stereo. That is why I give the logitech U E mini Boombox a lower score. It cannot be doubled up. I spent a lot of money to learn the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small, good Sound,but shows dirt!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after reading a traveler's review. The sound is good for small spaces - this is not a "Boombox" despite the name. It is a quality item with good tones. I listen to Ryan Adams, Wilco, Classical, etc. It even works well out by the pool. The only drawback I found is appearance. I hadn't had it 2 days and it showed every bit of newspapaer smudge, dirt, etc. You'd think it was a road warrior! Try the darker colored cases. That's the only reason I gave it a 4 vs. 5 star review. The outside surface is rubber so it can be cleaned. Enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wenzler

customer_reviews.title: Great shiznit! I use it in car in lieu ...
customer_reviews.text: Great shiznit! I use it in car in lieu of putting in proper head unit, charge it via car USB adapter, and it works just great - volume is just loud enough for highway speeds, easy setup and use. I am not an audiophile so cant really comment on how good the treble/mid/bass is but its certainly adequate for my needs. The only drawback is lack of mounting options - the box is rubberized so it doesnt slide much but still can get dislodged, and there are no provisions for securing it.
customer_reviews.author: Peteris Zeltins

customer_reviews.title: Big sound, little speaker
customer_reviews.text: First off, how cute is this little speaker? Seriously cute. I bought the blue one and I lurve the looks of it. Second, how durable is it. Amazingly so. It has a nice rubber wrap that protects it from dropping. And finally, most important, how great is the quality of the sound. It is great. It is loud and it has bass galore and it sounds amazing. I would take the portability and the quality of this speaker over the way overpriced Jambox any day. Plus you can charge this puppy up via micro USB. Best thing ever.
customer_reviews.author: Nerdgirl

customer_reviews.title: BAD SOUND QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my bro Caesar. They sucked!! I have a UE BOOM and wanted to get my brother a small Bluetooth speaker since I'm VERY happy with the sound quality and durability of my UE BOOM. These were tinny and had some funky vibrations going on. There are no sound controls, you can't mess with the treble and bass. I returned these ASAP. Ended up getting him a UE Boom.
customer_reviews.author: Kai808

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very loud, battery lasts a long time. The sound quality is good, but I found the bass a bit lacking. I play music from my Android tablet to this speaker and it sounds much better if I'm running an equalizer app. So anything that has a decent equalizer will sound pretty good on this thing. Range actually feels longer than 50'. I can go anywhere in my duplex without issue. Connects almost instantly, no issues with connecting to multiple devices. Also doesn't pick up interference that my other speakers do.
customer_reviews.author: Sun Puddle

customer_reviews.title: This boombox is quite good. It makes a little beep when it pairs ...
customer_reviews.text: This boombox is quite good. It makes a little beep when it pairs with your device which makes it easier to know what's going on. It works when charging as well and has good volume control. We take it with us everywhere, it is light and has decent battery life. Sound quality is good for such a small speaker, and we were pleasantly surprised by it. Range is not always perfect, but with so many devices around the house we can afford to have one in the same room as the boombox.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: A Fantastic Speaker at  Fantastic Price
customer_reviews.text: After seeing the positive review of this speaker over at TheWirecutter.com, I knew that this was going to be my replacement for my long in use iPhone docking radio. Now that I've moved to a Lightning-based iPhone, it was time to get a more modern speaker. Setup is easy, sound is great and loud, and pairing couldn't be more of a snap. One minor issue which I'm sure only effects me, the outer rubber covering became damaged as my cat attacked it one morning in an urge to wake me up for breakfast. Alas, but the speaker still works without an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Marty Day

customer_reviews.title: Like everything but the crackle
customer_reviews.text: I love the size. Got quick service. Functions great... but... often (not always) there is a crackle sound when I use it. Like a bad connection or a scratched up LP. It is LEAST likely to have an annoying crackle within 2 hours of being fully charged. It always makes the sound if being used WHILE being charged. I had hoped to solve the problem so I didn't return it. I didn't see any reviews sighting a similar problem. Now I tend to think I just one that was a bit of a lemon. Advice. Check it well as soon as you receive it and deal with an issues immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Latte1sugar

customer_reviews.title: Nice design, decent sound, limited controls
customer_reviews.text: The sound is decent, particularly if it is used in a smaller room with something behind it to bounce the sound back. In an open room, the sound is a bit thin. The design is very minimalist, which I like. The packing is a bit overdone; too hard to open and unnecessarily complicated. Update after using for several months: I originally gave this product four stars, but after some experience with it I'm knocking off a star because of the lack of pause, forward, and backward controls on the unit. It's just not that convenient to use.
customer_reviews.author: SmartBean

customer_reviews.title: And the quality is not as good as a lot some people pretend
customer_reviews.text: The bluetooth connection is working perfectly. The power of the speaker is not as strong as the other comments suggest. And the quality is not as good as a lot some people pretend. The truth is the following : The speaker is to small to produce a quality sound, or a hight volume. It's only good if you have to stayynear the speaker at medium level, or if you tolerate easily a bad sound, only then can you use it at max cause the distortion is intense. So it's definitely not about quality, it only practical because of bluetooth and no cables and small and light.
customer_reviews.author: Dave M.

customer_reviews.title: Mobile Sound
customer_reviews.text: This is the Mobile Boombox, not the Mini Boombox. I didn't find out the difference until i had already received the speaker. The app which allows you to double up two of these and shows the battery meter only works on the mini. However, that small disappointment aside, I decided to keep this speaker because of its amazing sound quality at an unbeatable price. It's very compact and much sturdier than the former generation. Bluetooth connects effortlessly, and battery lasts two to three days (under heavy use).
customer_reviews.author: cycle.d.shaped

customer_reviews.title: ... few months since I had this and I still love it. The rubbery material makes it great for ...
customer_reviews.text: Been a few months since I had this and I still love it. The rubbery material makes it great for placing on uneven surfaces and the rounded edges make it easy to stuff in a bag and take out with ease. The charge holds for a decent amount of time even on full volume. I have yet to be in a situation where the speaker died before I was done using it. I really don't have much to say because it does exactly what I want it to. Worth the price considering there are more expensive models out there that delivery the same or less.
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne Williams

customer_reviews.title: It's excellent speaker for Surface pro and iPad mini.....!
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a bluetooth speaker to compliment your Surface pro and iPad mini, don't look further. This little speaker (very small) is excellent for it. It's 110% better than Surface pro and iPad mini speakers. Since it is bluetooth, you can place it anywhere in the house (bathroom, living room, garage, dinning room, kitchen, etc). It works fine when I places the Surface pro in the master bedroom and UE in the kitchen and living room. Just to be clear- it cannot be compared to my 7.2 (two 12" subwoofers, two 5ft floor standing speakers, four celing speakers and one center speaker), but it serve it purpose very well.....
customer_reviews.author: Cole

customer_reviews.title: Get this!
customer_reviews.text: It was between this Logitech boombox and Jawbone jambox. I researched and researched and after reading the wirecutter blog I decided to go with the Logitech and I'm glad I did. It's super small/light and does exactly what it claims to do. Even though the jambox looks a lot better, I was really hesitant about getting it because of the negative reviews about it not pairing with some devices correctly. What would be the point of getting a mobile speaker if you can't pair it.. Right? Happy with this purchase and recommend it 100%
customer_reviews.author: Copper Turquoise

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: The speaker will not pair with my computer, so essentially doesn't work. The support staff at Logitech was very helpful in working through possible solutions, but it still doesn't work. I have been approved for a replacement, but after weeks it still hasn't been shipped. Logitech no longer makes this speaker, so will be replacing it with an upgraded model. My advice is not to buy this speaker from third parties. I liked the size, price, simple set up, etc. but mine simply didn't work and has yet to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Kane

customer_reviews.title: A little box with a big boom!!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -Very Compact. Great for travel -Build in rechargeable battery that last up to 10 hours -Great sound considering its size -Input line if you don't want to use bluetooth -Speakerphone Capabilities -Can be paired with another UE -Nice rubberized coating -Price Cons: -Will not charge your device -No auto shut off feature The bottom line: The UE delivers big sound for music, ebooks, netflix, etc via blue tooth or line in from you iphone or device of your choice. Considering its price, size, and suprising big sound, I would recommend the UE for those looking for a portable bluetooth speaker with great sound.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I got this speaker on the recommendation of The Wirecutter. I'm mostly using it for playing music outdoors - on the sidelines of Ultimate Frisbee, hanging out at the pool, family picnics, outdoor gaming, etc. I wanted a speaker that would be small enough to not take up much space in my bag but still loud enough to make it worth bringing. This little guy has an impressive volume for its size, and doesn't sound tinny at all - it's drastically better than the speakers in the $30-$40 range. Pairing it with my phone was effortless, and I've been very impressed with how long it holds a charge. Well worth the cost, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Hester

customer_reviews.title: Best BT speaker for the money
customer_reviews.text: Simply the best bluetooth speaker for the money. We've bought these as gifts as well, we're that pleased with them. The stereo mode works, and works well. It's not difficult to set up, however we don't find ourselves using that feature very often. One of these is plenty loud enough for any room (too loud at full volume), and outside for most of what we do. Very surprising how good the bass is on this.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: 12 months later - not as loud
customer_reviews.text: Loud at first, and it was perfect (Aug 2013) - I bought it for summer use, sadly the 2nd summer (June 2014) it was only half as loud, and not useable for a big room anymore or outside with the wind blowing in the trees (light wind). It had been on my office shelf the rest of the year - not in the elements or a cold room. I tested the one in Best Buy to double check my point of view on the level of volume - and yes, that is much louder in the store then what I bought a year ago.
customer_reviews.author: JDinNH

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my mother and liked it so much, got another for me
customer_reviews.text: I use it for audio books when I'm working in the yard or to listen to right before bed. I carry it from the living room to the kitchen to the bedroom to the yard. The sound is very good and it appears to be built very solidly. I charge it during the day when I'm at work and use it on and off all evening. Mine is paired with my iPhone, my mother's with her iPad. She also loves it. She is physically limited but it's small enough she can put it on her walker and take it anywhere in the house with her. Finally I got a present she REALLY likes!
customer_reviews.author: maddog

customer_reviews.title: Very useful gadget
customer_reviews.text: I drive long distances and love to listed to audio books while driving. I use this speaker together with my iPad and purchase innumerable books from Audible to listed to while driving. It works really well. I only have two small complaints. I wish I could crank the volume a little higher at times and I wish it had a reminder to turn it off when your device is shut gown. When I turn off my book I forget to turn the speaker off and it runs out of power. I bought a car charger for it and solved that problem!
customer_reviews.author: Tricksy

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! It handles rough handling very well. My brother and sister both bought one after they saw mine. Everyone is very happy with them. The battery lasts a long time and even if it is completely dead, you can plug in the charger (standard micro USB) and start using it right away. The 3.5mm audio jack is handy when you don't feel like using Bluetooth. I wish it was a little less expensive but you get what you pay for most of them time. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: gwiz

customer_reviews.title: the sound is great for me
customer_reviews.text: the sound is great for me...I'm not a picky afficionado about the finer points of sound. I use it in my studio to sync with my iPad for music. My one BIG complaint is that it cuts out about every 30 to 45 mins for about 20 seconds. My guess is it's losing the wifi signal, and is trying to reacquire it. I have the strongest router available, so it's not my wifi losing signal...it's the speaker. However, it's not enough of an inconvenience to return it, and I'm just fine with its foible.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Anstaett

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little speaker.
customer_reviews.text: Like you I read all the reviews, here and in other websites. After much inner debate I decided that the design and price were right enough to try its sound. It was a great decision. It has great sound for it's form factor. It comes in great colors which should match your lifestyle, great battery life and great price. This is not an audiophile product. It is a great little speaker for small barbeques, dinner with friends, road trips if your car's stereo it's busted and easy listening in hotel's rooms and pools. If anything of the above sounds like your needs then this is a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: Raul Duran

customer_reviews.title: Greg
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It does just what is supposed to do. It makes speakerphone conversations much more enjoyable. I also bought one for my father who has a hearing deficit and he is now able to hear and understand our phone calls. It's not a replacement for a hi-fidelity WiFi remote stereo speaker, but for casual music listening, it provides surprisingly good quality. Bluetooth pairing with our iPhones is easy and reliable. The battery lasts about 10 hours when the boom box is left on. My only minor nit is that the USB power cord should be about twice as long.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Daily Use
customer_reviews.text: I use it daily I am always driving for work. and it plays the music just fine nice and loud the bluetooth feature is good as well the other person says they can hear me clearly. Battery is awesome I rarely charge it and I use it alot. The only thing i don't understand about it is that when your watching a video the words don't match up with the lips (there is a delay) (on youtube,Netflix Iphone 5) but all in all a good little machine!
customer_reviews.author: Paramedicc

customer_reviews.title: Works great with Nexus 4 phone
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our daughter to use with LG Nexus 4 phone. It pairs easily and works great, with decent audio quality and very nice portability. It is very cute and she likes it. The one surprise was that it is rather small in size -- check out the dimensions. I had expected it to be small, but it is even smaller than I realized. It also came in very nice "crystal" style packaging that is very elegant and makes it even more suitable to be a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Sitting in Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Great little Speaker
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for a camping trip that we had coming up. The sound quality is very good for a speaker of its size, although the bass response is not that powerful. I did expect this due to its size though, so I don't really take off any points for that. The battery life is very good, and it is super easy to connect to your phone. The speakerphone quality is very good as well, as is the range. I use it to play rain & thunder on my bedside table every night to help me sleep. It's a great little speaker!
customer_reviews.author: Theo

customer_reviews.title: We love this
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband for Christmas, as he was previously listening to music straight from his iPhone. Right out of the box, this speaker was super easy to set up and synch with his phone and we had Christmas music playing on Christmas morning as soon as he opened it. Sound quality is awesome. This thing is pretty small, smaller than I was expecting actually, but you wouldn't believe how great the music sounds. And it can get loud! Great item, came on time and in perfect condition. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: they were great and it was covered under warranty so a replacement ...
customer_reviews.text: Ended up having to return the first device due to extremely loud static that would kick in even with no music playing. Required me to physically turn off device to silence it. Logitech said it was a known issue, they were great and it was covered under warranty so a replacement was sent out. Unfortunately, the 2nd device was a slightly different model and I don't think it sounds quite as good as the original which is no longer being made. 2nd device also drops bluetooth connection frequently requiring a remove of device pairing and re-pairing, which is very annoying. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Easy-Peasy!
customer_reviews.text: So appreciate the ease with which this pairs! I returned a JBL micro because it was very unreliable for pairing. Since I can control the sound quality of this with equalizers on various devices, I've been very pleased with sound quality. I'm impressed with the sturdiness and heft of this, even though it's extremely portable, and pack it in a small digital camera case for protection. Good job, Logitech, and thanks Amazon for the great price reduction for the black!
customer_reviews.author: K. Kurtz

customer_reviews.title: astonishing
customer_reviews.text: this is far best the #1 thing i have bought in a long time i read thounsends of review looking for the perfect portable bluetooth speaker rechargable i was looking 5/5 -portability 5/5 -sound 5/5 -bluetooth 5/5 -good looks 5/5 i paid US$70.00 its not a boos speacker and it dosent cost US$450.00 but it sound great the time from i took it out of the box to i had it sound in 1 min 30 sec
customer_reviews.author: Leandro

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, high price.
customer_reviews.text: It's good. Not killer, but very good. In an average sized room, you'll get very good sound with no distortion. The 3 stars comes from the price. These small Bluetooth speakers are just overpriced for what's in them. Kind of like the beats headphones. Cheap parts, heavy base tuning.. not $299 of gear there. Maybe $49. These are the same. They're $5-8 of parts, maybe $10. They should sell for $39, $49 tops.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Buy this speaker dock
customer_reviews.text: I've gone through quite a few small sub $100 speaker docks. This one blows all of them out of the water. Smaller than I expected, heavier than I expected, and sounds amazing for it's size. Holds a charge forever, and seems to have between 8 and 10 hours of life when fully charged. Pairing with devices is super easy, speaker phone feature is a nice plus. This is the speaker dock to buy if you're looking for under $100 and portable. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: After a Rocky Start I've Come to Like This Product a Lot
customer_reviews.text: The first one I bought I couldn't get to work at all and later had to return it. I got a replacement rather than a refund and I'm glad I did. The second one works great and the sound it excellent. I synced my Iphone, iPad and IMac without any problems. I also moved the speaker to different rooms to see how it worked. It succeeded very well. However I will say I live in a one floor condo so how it would work in a bigger house I don't know.
customer_reviews.author: LA Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great Personal Speaker
customer_reviews.text: Great personal speaker for the beach, kitchen, etc. Good sound but I wish it was a little bit louder. I have a logitech s715i but got this because I got the iPhone 5 and needed something I could connect to. Not as loud as s715i, which in now in my garage. The smaller size of the speaker makes it a lot less of a hassle to take places. If you are wanting to have something loud enough for a group at a backyard bbq, beach trip, or something along those lines I would recommend upgrading to the next size. For personal use this is great.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Walters

customer_reviews.title: Great product for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I looked at more expensive bluetooth speakers, but in the end, for my needs this little guy is perfect. I am currently using it while my husband and I paint and do other renovations to a home we recently purchased. Delivers great sound that I can hear even outside of the house. I think that the price is great for what you get with this speaker. No, it is not something that is going to blow your eardrums out or give you amazing bass, but it exceeds my expectations on both sound and quality.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Others have said it, I'm behind them - this thing is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a small, portable speaker that would pack a punch and the Logitech mini boombox is just that. I've paired it with a Samsung Tab2, LG2 phone, Samsung Note and an Iphone with no problems. I love the minimalist design and the ease of use. This speaker delivers on the sound - I can't believe how much of it they could pack into such a small package. The battery lasts me about 12 hours of non stop use on loud. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Anais

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Boombox!
customer_reviews.text: Took this boombox on vacation and loved it. Pros: 1. Compact. 2. Solidly built and rugged. 3. Very good sound for its size. 4. Pairs easily (Tried new Ipad and 2 Iphones). 5. Bluetooth has good range (it still played 20' and one room aawy from speaker). 6. Nice audio sound when paired after power up. 7. Easy to hold (rubberized). 8. Controls simple, work well and intuitive. 9. Reasonable value for the money. 10. Micro USB for charging and mini stereo in for none bluetooth devices. 11. Speakerphone works OK. Cons: 1. Could be louder at full volume. 2. Microphone could be more sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl A. Laidig

customer_reviews.title: nieces and nephews loved the gift!
customer_reviews.text: I gave these to my 3 nieces and 1 nephew (ages 12-15) for Christmas this year. They loved them and their parents were impressed with the sound quailty and volume from such a small speaker. They were very easy to use right out of the box by pairing with iphones and Samsung phones. One niece plans on brining it on the bus to go to school basketball games, as it is small and light enough to easily fit in a back pack. All 4 of the kids are brining the speakers on their Christmas vacation to St. Thomas.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Baker

customer_reviews.title: I love this speaker!
customer_reviews.text: I've got in in my bathroom. My wife and I both use our phones to drive it. It works great, has a real nice sound and gets loud enough to hear over the fan and shower. I've been looking for a way to put music into our bathroom for years but I never wanted the hassle of running wire from the stereo to the other end of the house. This is little but has a great sound, fits on top of my medicine chest. It's perfect in it's price range.
customer_reviews.author: F. J. Cote

customer_reviews.title: Excellent speaker for the price
customer_reviews.text: I've had this speaker for awhile now and I love it! I use it every morning to listen to music and podcast apps while getting ready for work. Its even load enough to hear while in the shower. I keep it in the bathroom and I can still hear it while in my bedroom closet. I only have to charge it once a week. It does move slightly because of vibration when turned up to the max volume. Its an overall great product.
customer_reviews.author: God is good

customer_reviews.title: Love this speaker!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker does everything I want it to do. I am not a tech wiz, but I read the instructions, downloaded the app to my phone and tablet, and within minutes had both paired. The simplicity of this product is perfect for my needs. It is also durable. While I cannot address how well it compares with other speakers, I would not hesitate to give it as a gift or recommend it for purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CarolZ.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Little Radio
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite purchases so far this summer! I take this little radio everywhere! It stays in my bathroom as i get dressed, in hotel rooms, by the pool, at the beach! It's small, it connects really easy and it's loud enough. The quality is great. And the battery seems to last for hours. I've had it by the pool playing for three hours and it didn't dent the charge! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Shantell

customer_reviews.title: Portable and Convenient, but Volume Is Limited
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product about a month ago. I was looking for something like the Bose Sounddock that was cheaper and didn't have to be plugged in. Upon receiving this product, I was a bit surprised by 1)How small it is and 2)How little sound it puts out. I enjoy listening to this when I'm inside and no other noises are interfering, but taking this outside to listen to music by the pool is an exercise in futility. Overall, I am happy with the product, and it's great for easy listening, but potential buyers should note that this speaker isn't adequate for hosting parties or playing outside.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan P. Cole

customer_reviews.title: Lots of sound and a great value
customer_reviews.text: I looked at Jawbone and JBL--both good speakers. The Jawbone was a over a $100 and the JBL was a bit too small. So I opted for the UE Boombox. It's rubberized and has 2 speakers. It's a perfect sound companion when relaxing in the backyard or while in the kitchen. It charges quickly--less than 2 hours and has a sound notification as well as an led light when it's bluetooth connected or powered on/off.
customer_reviews.author: Giacomo

customer_reviews.title: Best value on the market
customer_reviews.text: I've had several different brands of Bluetooth speakers and this is by far my favorite one. It has great sound and is really durable. I use it all the time and can even hear it over the shower running. The battery life is great and the plug fits a mini-USB, so you can substitute the cord if need be (most people have at least one charger around their house that size since it used to be the standard for cell phones).
customer_reviews.author: Aalloy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I use this more than I thought I would. I have a larger bose bluetooth I keep in my living room and do not really move it. This little booger goes from my room to the kitchen to my home gym. Keeps a charge a long time and has really good sound. It is small enough to throw in a backpack and sturdy enough to be dropped a few times. Good: Small, durable and good sound Bad: Nada Overall: I love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nicely Conceived and Implemented
customer_reviews.text: Logitech's designers seemed to consider what I needed and then they delivered. Great Sound - check! Compact Size - Check. Long Battery Life (>6 hours in my experience) - Check. Rechargable with Micro USB - Check. Easy Bluetooth Connection - Check. Cable Connection for Devices without Bluetooth - Check. There are more expensive units available, but for my needs, I don't see how they would be better.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Deken

customer_reviews.title: Strong sound!
customer_reviews.text: Middles are a little subdued, but all in all a good sound. Sometimes have to turn bluetooth on and off on a device to find it again. Most discouraging thing is the delay when watching video. Lips are not in sync. This is apparently true of all bluetooth devices, to some extend or another. It has a jack for direct wiring that eliminates the issue, if the device you are using has a headphone jack for output.
customer_reviews.author: G. Kreis

customer_reviews.title: Hands down the best purchase I have ever made
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best purchase I have ever made! I bought this speaker two years ago, and it still works amazing. I have gotten it where it, incredibly dirty, dropped it off my balcony, etc..., and it still has never messed up. I use it every day while I'm in the shower and in my car and it takes at least a week to need a charge. I will definitely be buying the exact same speaker if my current one ever goes out.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Great sound easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I like to bring this out on the patio when I enjoy the late afternoon sun and my IPA. The rubber grip is nice, the design is well thought out, the materials are top quality. The sound is amazing for such a little device. I'm not an audiophile, I just like listening to music. I wish more devices were like this - nice, minimal design - three buttons and a switch works for me.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by TheWirecutter.com, and they were right
customer_reviews.text: Great wireless speaker for a great price. Easy to pair with my Mac, iPhone and iPad. Controls are well-thought-out and the rubberized exterior (which apparently keeps the speaker from moving around when the bass is heavy) makes it feel like this device can stand up to some rough handling. Appreciate that it includes an auxiliary jack for devices that lack Bluetooth. Runs an *incredibly* long time on a single charge. Had mine for almost 3 weeks and it's still running off the charge it arrived with.
customer_reviews.author: iconmaster

customer_reviews.title: Worth $30.
customer_reviews.text: bought two. Tried to link them, no success. Downloaded the app, could not link them. The sound of this thing is really "shouty". Sure, it's loud, but not in a musical way. I really expected more from this. And I really though it would be easy to link two. I've spent around 3 hours trying to link two, following all the instructions to the letter. Does not work. App sucks, sound sucks. I will listen to NPR on this thing. Sad.
customer_reviews.author: JTez

customer_reviews.title: Best mini bluetooth speaker I've seen
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these about 8 months ago and loved it so much I got another one for my wife. They are durable, stay charged for a long time, and have great sound quality. I was looking at Jamboxes originally and bought one of each. The sound was much better in the mid ranges on the Logitech and the high's weren't as tinny. Can't believe its a superior product that costs less but I'm all for it!
customer_reviews.author: Smytti Reviews

customer_reviews.title: wow
customer_reviews.text: so ive had three or four bluetooth radios over the years. this one is awesome. small enough to take anywhere. but really what did it for me was the awesome battery life. I had this speaker playing for well over 8 hours the other night. shut it off when i went to bed and still had an hour or so the next morning. easy to pair with devices. good clear sound. For the money i dont think theres a better one out there.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Best Bluetooth device ever.
customer_reviews.text: What a great little device. Easiest pairing of any Bluetooth device I've ever tried. Came charged and ready to use. 30 seconds out of the box and I was using it. Sounds great on both ends of phone conversation. Sounds great playing music. I would give it 6 stars if I could. The one thing I would like and this is a small thing is a button on the device to answer calls. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard G. Maner

customer_reviews.title: Great sound from a little speaker.
customer_reviews.text: For such a little thing it has great sound! I've used this inside and out. The sound is much better than I expected. While I haven't the exact number of hours it lasts on a charge I know it lasted for the four hours of my continuous use without any problem. We used it with FaceTime and felt we could hear better with the speaker however the person on the other end thought we sounded tinny but she could hear and understand everything we said. All in all we're happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Campion

customer_reviews.title: No need for anything better
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I take this everywhere. It's portable, easy to use and has great sound indoors and out. We considered spending more money on more expensive bluetooth speakers, but at the end of the day, this was all we needed! We saved $150 (at least) by buying this little guy and it does everything we want it to. It's sturdy and well made so it can handle being in a kid-filled environment just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Size to sound ratio excellent
customer_reviews.text: It was smaller than I had expected from the picture (no hand holding it to see relative size). But I was pleasantly surprised by the sound volume and quality. I was using it exclusively for watching movies on my iPad with no problem. I switched back to my stereo speakers though because they are of course much better. But while traveling from room to room doing chores this little guy is quite adequate
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Addict

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: I love the sound of this little device. It connects quickly with my phone, tablet or laptop and keeps it's charge for a long time. The bass response is good, better than most similar sized mini-speakers. I am very happy with this purchase for the price I paid for it! I carry it in my laptop bag now wherever I go.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley A.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the cost
customer_reviews.text: I've been in need of a speaker for a while but didn't know what to get. For being the small size it is, it sounds pretty good. Obviously not gonna have Bose quality sound, but good for how much I paid for it. I use this primarily to listen to music and it is loud enough to fill my apartment. I also like the benefit of being able to use it as a speakerphone if I want.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set of speakers for travel, and now we might buy two more! It's the right size and it sounds terrific. Perfect for hotel room or bath room at home relaxing in bath tub. It's easy to use. It connected with my iPhones, my MacBook Air with no problem at all. Great product. Great price! Significantly cheaper than Jambox which is a terrific product, but this is better priced.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wong

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, long life battery
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for long car rides after my car stereo gave up the ghost (along with a stereo audio cable). I use it to play stuff from my ipod - and it works great. It holds a charge a long time - I have never drained the battery even after listening to it for 12 hours straight before re-charging. (I am careful not to leave it in the car in the sun).
customer_reviews.author: Deborah M.

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my boyfriend to put in the garage while he was working. I promise you it sounds great. The treble is clear, the bass is boomy enough, and the volume can get to a pretty high level without that crunchy sound like it's blowing up the teeny speaker. Connecting to either of our iPhones is cinch, and the size is remarkable considering it's output capabilities. Sure, there are larger, fancier, and more expensive bluetooth speakers in the market. But for the size and price of the Logitech UE Boombox, it continues to impress us 6 months later.
customer_reviews.author: M. Phan

customer_reviews.title: Impressive performance in a tiny package
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is impressive. Very small form factor, and at the same time loud and powerful. It's built like a tank, looks great, very easy to setup (just press a button) and the sound quality exceeds any expectation for such a small item. Would recommend to anyone, especially now that a newer revision came out, supposedly even louder.
customer_reviews.author: Cosimo Cecchi

customer_reviews.title: This Speaker DELIVERS!  Great sound you can hold in your hand!  Don't overspend - do your homework!
customer_reviews.text: I shopped around and listened to many, many speakers before finally buying this Logitech. I love it! Plenty of bass and a great sound. Don't spend hundreds of dollars when you can get the same sound out of this Logitech. Do your homework and save money. This is a nice compact speaker (but not tiny) with a huge sound. You will not be disappointed if you purchase this item.
customer_reviews.author: Luv2Fish

customer_reviews.title: THESE DONT DOUBLE UP
customer_reviews.text: I will admit I didn't understand the difference between MOBILE BOOMBOX and MINI BOOM until after I purchased two speakers and destroyed/tossed the package. They are identical in appearance. One sounds quite good and the other is ok, but it's significant the difference between the two. Mostly I'm frustrated that I couldn't double up though. Ultimately I'm responsible for the ignorance, but this is a frequent occurrence.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Sound is great -- could be a little louder
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is small with great sound. I have compared it with other bluetooth speakers and this one wins according to my wife and daughters, and me. We use this speaker to listen to music on our patio outside. If you plan on entertaining lots of people, this speaker is not for you. If you and the wife are wanting to listen to music or you are in one room of the house, this speaker is excellent. Sound is great.
customer_reviews.author: jasonfire

customer_reviews.title: Holy cow this blew me away!
customer_reviews.text: Could not believe the quality for the price! KILLER bass response, and clear and concise full range even at max volume...which is quite loud by the way. Bought it to primarily use while I am getting ready for work, and man it screams. Various types of music make this little gem soar... Cost to quality, fantastic. LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: TM4512

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great for the beach, roofdeck, shower, anywhere. Sound works really well and it's very easy to use. Battery seems to last much longer on the stereo than on my iPhone 4S, so you are limited by your phone's battery while the bluetooth function is enabled. I read extensive reviews before buying this product, and it is definitely the best sound for your buck.
customer_reviews.author: Closet Loser

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sounding Bluetooth portable speaker for the price. I purchased a pair of Tweakers 2+ years ago for travel but was very disappointed with the volume output. This time I did some research and decided to purchased this product. I must admit I was skepical due to my Tweakers experience, but what a big difference in sound and volume quality! The Bluetooth connection was easy setup with the iPhone 5. The unit controls are simply on/off switch and volume contol, but it does have a microphone for phone calls though I have not tried this yet. Do not expect to find audio adjustments on this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Donna M McClintick

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased other Logitech products and have never been disappointed and this Boombox is no different. Great sound out of a very small package, "Boombox" is an appropriate name. Synchronized easily with 2 iPads and an iPhone and so far has not lost connectivity during each use. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rserrag

customer_reviews.title: Not as loud as I expected
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality product, very solid build, perfect for what it must endure being at work with me. However, it is not loud enough! As far as speakers go, my expectation is that 3/4 volume should be loud enough for most environments. But I suppose this attribute can be overlooked because of the ridiculously long battery life!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff M

customer_reviews.title: I love this little guy!
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit that I was expecting a bigger speaker and I was doubting it will do the job. I was worng. It was very easy topair with my iphone and it has a great sound. I live in a 1 bdr apt and I can trun it on from my bedroom to the living room. I love it. I am thinking in pruchasing another one for the bathroom. It is small and can be carried easily to my dance practice!
customer_reviews.author: Luccas

customer_reviews.title: like it
customer_reviews.text: The UE has met or exceeded my expectations for delivering good quality sound from my iTunes library via my iPhone. That's why I purchased it. Like the shape better than the Jawbone and the sound seems as good or better. Wish the base output was stronger but all these ultra small devices suffer the same limitations. Not willing to pay for a Bose soundlink and deal with its size. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: FloridaFitz

customer_reviews.title: Loving this Little Speaker
customer_reviews.text: This Wireless Bluetooth speaker is great! I have used this multiple times around my apartment while playing games, at parties, but mostly while showering so I can have some music in the bathroom! It works great, good battery life, Amazingly loud for its size. I recommend this for music lovers and anyone with a Bluetooth device (Iphone or ect)
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Talbot

customer_reviews.title: Love the sound quality in the small package
customer_reviews.text: The Logitech boombox was a perfect gift for my husband. It is small but sturdy, about the size of very small pound cake. He uses it in the morning to listen to sports radio and the sound quality is great, even when multiple people are talking. We also take it on the deck when grilling. The USB charger is very convenient. My only issue, which is kind of a good thing, is that the initial packaging was like opening Ft. Knox!
customer_reviews.author: RedMo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little speaker!
customer_reviews.text: Love this speaker. I take it everywhere and use with phone. Although it is not among the cheapest speakerrs, I feel I am getting my money's worth, in terms of quality build, volume, size and I also lke the non-slip surface, which prevents and may even cushion falls. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: D. J. Roth

customer_reviews.title: Great sound. Connects wirelessly to my smartphone and has ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd one I have purchased. Gave the first one to a friend and had to buy another one. Great sound. Connects wirelessly to my smartphone and has excellent base. Easy to carry with you. Also the seller sent this very quickly and it was well packaged. Excellent price on this unit. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Edwin I. Plimpton

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and very loud for a small speaker.
customer_reviews.text: great sound and very loud for a small speaker. I love this speaker I use it every day at work. I'm thinking of buying a second one for the garage.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Two Thumbs Up !!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adore this little blue tooth speaker. Its loud, cordless , & compact. No complicated instructions for hook up. just sync to your device and your good to go. Also very durable , have dropped it a few times and it still works perfectly. I plan on ordering another one soon.
customer_reviews.author: Lora
